title: The host-centric web
description: One major problem of the current host-centric internet architecture is that documents are host-certified - we refer to data by location instead of contents, but that leads to link rot & content drift. Information is fragile without an ecosystem of identity, reputation, references, context & liability - our digital history lacks a solid foundation.
